alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 7:51PM AKDT until September 02 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Tanana River from Delta Junction to Nenana, including Fairbanks * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is occurring in low lying areas along the Tanana River from Delta to Nenana. In Fairbanks, water from 1 to 3 feet deep is flowing over portions of Perkins Drive, Melanie Lane, and Chief John Drive. Several driveways and yards are inundated with water. Minor flooding is also occuring around the boat landing at Whitestone Farms near Delta Junction. Minor flooding or bankfull conditions are expected through Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 745 PM AKDT, heavy rain that fell over the south slopes of the Alaska Range from Denali to the Alcan Border is causing high water to flow down the Delta River and other rivers draining the Alaska Range. This has caused the Tanana River to rise to bankfull and overbank in some locations. Additional heavy rain in the Alaska Range the next few days will result in more runoff into the Tanana River into the weekend. - For those recreating or hunting on the Tanana River, all gravel bars will be covered with water, debris will be in the river, along with increased erosion. Be cautious of rising water levels if you plan to park your vehicle near the river while out on your boat. - For Tanana River at Fairbanks: At 7:15pm the stage was 25.13 feet. Flood Stage is 24.5 feet. Forecast: The river is expected to remain above flood stage through Sunday. - Http://www.weather.gov/aprfc - If you live near or along the Tanana River stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley
